Reviews.Title: SO so
Reviews.Author: Charles M. Moughamian
Reviews.Content: I brought this and ended up replacing with a better more high end cable. To me it was a waste of money. You might want to shop around for a better quality cable for both video and line current.

Reviews.Title: Better options available
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: The gauge of the wire is very small so if you pull on the ends with any amount of effort there is a good chance you will pull the strands of wire right out.I've used a handful of these for security camera installations. I've pulled 3 apart by accident when trying to fish them, even gently, through a concealed hole. If you're not going to hide the wire and surface mount them then you probably won't have any issues if you take care with the install.You're better off spending the little extra and using cat5 wire and baluns. Even if your not handy at crimping rj45 ends onto cat5 then buy a patch cord at the length you need. It serves the same purpose and you have a much more sturdy product in the end.

Reviews.Title: Did what it was suppose to.
Reviews.Author: Bill Schebeck
Reviews.Content: Not much to say.  Good quality connectors and durable construction.  Don't recommend splicing, Wire may be coated and hard to solder.

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: These wires are very flexible and seem durable enough. Of course only time will tell if I made the right decision. For now, I am happy with them and I would definitely buy the same kind and brand again.

Reviews.Title: A good lenght
Reviews.Author: Ronald Kinner
Reviews.Content: Cable was very good length for our side door camera.was easy to install and work withShipped right with other items

Reviews.Title: Video Power CCTV Camera Cable
Reviews.Author: Black Eyes "Frosed"
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these cables for the two cameras I bought.I installed one, but have not installed the other.I like the small size and the flexibility of the cable.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: justin hedricks
Reviews.Content: We bought this cable for our security camera outside. I wrapped the connections in electrical tape and its been out in the elements for months now with no problems

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: John F. Keith
Reviews.Content: This cable is good quality at a great price. Light weight and very easy to hook up.  Cable allows power, video and audio feeds..

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: LB
Reviews.Content: These cables are good quality & good value . The length serves our purpose perfectly. I have purchased them before & will again.

Reviews.Title: Decent but ok!
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: A thin wire,  but does the job!  No stapler s to be used or else throws the picture out of focus, no pressure on the thin wire

Reviews.Title: Cable
Reviews.Author: John Lesnak "Big John"
Reviews.Content: What is there to say about a cable? It has a small diameter and is very easy to work with.

Reviews.Title: BUY More
Reviews.Author: bilko
Reviews.Content: Great wiring  fits my exiting cameras with  adaptors or just get the camera with bnc connectors and your done .

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: HMH "hmichael0330"
Reviews.Content: I bought this product recently to expand my security system around the house and from the beginning I could tell by the packaging that this was a nice product.  It came complete, as advertised with the 2 adapters.  The cable works flawlessly up to now and I have no complaint whatsoever about the vendor.  Delivery was also on time which was great considering that this project was time sensitive for me, just like everything else I do...time is important.  Would I buy this product again or recommend it to a friend?  YES.  Absolutely  !!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: tangled
Reviews.Author: jimmy
Reviews.Content: The wire looked easy to roll put them all out. All the sudden it was so  it took me ten mons to untangle

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: christopher
Reviews.Content: thank you it works fine. it will take care of what i need it to do. again thank you for your help.

Reviews.Title: CCTV BNC cable
Reviews.Author: Art M "Moses"
Reviews.Content: Not the best cable as far as gauge. Another drawback is the cable can not be separated like real BNC cable. Adequate for analog Home rated CCTV use.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Security Camera Cable 66'
Reviews.Author: kimie zajac
Reviews.Content: Thank you VideoSecur good cable arrived on time, have your cables from before they work great have not used these as yet. Very reasonable in price, thank you

Reviews.Title: Nice cable.
Reviews.Author: shaqolate
Reviews.Content: This cable is performing well on my outdoor camera. I haven't had any issues and wouldn't hesitate to buy another.

Reviews.Title: needed more cable to install into the house.
Reviews.Author: preybird1
Reviews.Content: This white cable is easier to hide with the paint color on my house. Feels thicker hope it can handle fooftop heat! I have never seen anything about heat resistance on cheaper brand cables????

Reviews.Title: a good buy
Reviews.Author: K. lett "gemini6kl"
Reviews.Content: worked great for hooking up my camera, a great buy . would recommend, and the price is just right .

Reviews.Title: Worked Great
Reviews.Author: vwsurf
Reviews.Content: I have this ran in the attic, and it has no issues with the Florida heat. You will need a connector for the video side of the cable I think the power side connects up.

Reviews.Title: one out of three was bad
Reviews.Author: diy
Reviews.Content: I ordered these should have known would be problems one was shorted screwed up power supply. went to Parts Express bought two rg59 cable and power supply  one cable was bad thats quality control in CHINA

Reviews.Title: Not happy with this product at all.
Reviews.Author: Ms Rich
Reviews.Content: I ordered the camera and this cable from them, ready to install and everything had to stopped because of it not working. What a bomber. Now I may have to returned the camera because it does not seem to want to work using a cable longer than this one. So ask questions first.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: OnTheGroundNOW
Reviews.Content: Cables are a funny thing. Either they work good or they don't.These cables are the best.They are thicker than most, soft and easily workable, the fittings are top shelf quality, they work.The fittings are secured nicely to the bable and if you bump them the video signal doesn't freak out.They are solid.Get some.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: glennheywood
Reviews.Content: This is a good product with a good price.  I hooked up the video camera cable and got a quality signal.  I was happy with this purchase and bought another one.  Thank you.

ProductInfo.Features:
Plug and Play ready; For camera with DC power only
66 feet video/power cable in white
BNC video & 2.1mm power connectors
All-in-one video and power cable
BNC connectors and includes 2 RCA/BNC adapters
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 66ft Feet Video Power Cable BNC RCA Wire Security Camera Cord for CCTV DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus Connector WE9
